00037       public LibraryChecker(String[] assemblyNames, Type[] customTypes)
00038       {
00039          this.assemblies = new Assembly[assemblyNames.Length];
00040          for (int i = 0; i < assemblyNames.Length; i++)
00041          {
00042 #pragma warning disable 618,612
00043             this.assemblies[i] = Assembly.LoadWithPartialName(assemblyNames[i]);
00044             if (this.assemblies[i] == null)
00045             {
00046                try
00047                {
00048                   this.assemblies[i] = Assembly.LoadFrom(assemblyNames[i]);
00049                }
00050                catch (Exception)
00051                {
00052                   throw new ArgumentException(assemblyNames[i] + " cannot be loaded");
00053                }
00054             }
00055 #pragma warning restore 618,612
00056          }
00057          this.CustomTypes = customTypes;
00058       }
00059

00070                 public Boolean CheckType(String searchType)
00071                 {
00072                         return (this.GetType(searchType) != null);
00073                 }
00074 
00080                 public Type GetType(String searchType)
00081                 {
00082                         Type type;
00083          foreach (Type t in CustomTypes)
00084          {
00085             if (t.FullName.Equals(searchType))
00086                return t;
00087             if (searchType.EndsWith("[]") && t.FullName.Equals(searchType.Substring(0, searchType.Length - 2)))
00088                return t.MakeArrayType();
00089          }
00090 
00091          foreach (Assembly asm in this.assemblies)
00092          {
00093             foreach (Module mod in asm.GetModules())
00094             {
00095                type = mod.GetType(searchType);
00096 
00097                if (type != null)
00098                {
00099                   return type;
00100                }
00101             }
00102          }
00103                    return null;
00104                 }
00105 
00112       public Type GetType(String searchType, ICollection<string> searchPath)
00113       {
00114          Type type;
00115          type = GetType(searchType);
00116          if (type != null)
00117             return type;
00118 
00119          foreach (String s in searchPath)
00120          {
00121             foreach (Type t in CustomTypes)
00122             {
00123                if (t.FullName.Equals(s + "." + searchType))
00124                   return t;
00125             }
00126             foreach (Assembly asm in this.assemblies)
00127             {
00128                foreach (Module mod in asm.GetModules())
00129                {
00130                   type = mod.GetType(s + "." + searchType);
00131 
00132                   if (type != null)
00133                   {
00134                      return type;
00135                   }
00136                }
00137             }
00138          }
00139          return null;
00140       }

00161                 public MethodInfo GetMethod(String searchType, String searchMethod, String[] searchParamTypes)
00162                 {
00163                         Type type = this.GetType(searchType);
00164 
00165                         if (type == null)
00166                         {
00167                                 return null;
00168                         }
00169 
00170                         Type[] paramTypes = new Type[searchParamTypes.Length];
00171 
00172                         for (int i = 0; i < searchParamTypes.Length; i++)
00173                         {
00174                                 paramTypes[i] = this.GetType(searchParamTypes[i]);
00175 
00176                                 if (paramTypes[i] == null)
00177                                 {
00178                                         return null;
00179                                 }
00180                         }
00181 
00182                         MethodInfo method = type.GetMethod(searchMethod, BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy, null, paramTypes, null);
00183 
00184                         return method;
00185                 }

00219                 public Boolean CheckMethodName(String searchType, String searchMethod)
00220                 {
00221                         Type type = this.GetType(searchType);
00222 
00223                         if (type == null)
00224                         {
00225                                 return false;
00226                         }
00227 
00228                         foreach (MethodInfo m in type.GetMethods())
00229                         {
00230 
00231                                 if (m.Name == searchMethod)
00232                                 {
00233                                         return true;
00234                                 }
00235                         }
00236 
00237                         return false;
00238                 }

00401       public static T[] ToArray<T>(IdEntry[] entries)
00402       {
00403          T[] ret = new T[entries.Length];
00404          for (int i = 0; i < entries.Length; i++)
00405          {
00406             ret[i] = (T)entries[i].ReflectionObject;
00407          }
00408          return ret;
00409       }
